name: sabre-dav
description: SabreDAV is a WebDAV server framework in PHP for exposing files and calendars over HTTP. Itâ€™s used in many self-hosted apps like ownCloud and Nextcloud.

features.title: Webdav Server
features.description: Provides standards-compliant WebDAV protocol implementation for file access over HTTP

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Enables calendar synchronization across devices using the CalDAV protocol

features.title: Plugin System
features.description: Extend functionality with custom plugins for authentication, storage, and features

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Implements fine-grained permissions and authentication mechanisms for secure access

features.title: Property Storage
features.description: Supports custom WebDAV properties for metadata and extended attributes
